Producer: Aton Soumache, Dimitri Rassam, Alexis Vonarb, Axel Von Maydell, Moritz Borman, Timothy Burrill, Bin Wu
Screenwriter: Blaise Hemingway, Greg Erb, Jason Oremland
Production Co: DMG Entertainment, Morgen Studios, ON Animation Studios, Wild Bunch, M6 Films, STX Entertainment, Dickhouse Productions
Synopsis: Maria and her younger brother Charlie find themselves magically transported to the fantastical world of Playmobil. While there, they encounter robots, Vikings, knights, pirates and other colorfully amusing characters. But when Charlie winds up in the clutches of an evil emperor, Maria joins forces with a bumbling secret agent and an adventurous truck driver to rescue her beloved sibling.
Title: Playmobil: The Movie
